docs.text: Hi, Selamat datang di Vulnerability API.
docs.title: Beranda

docs.text: Tentang Apa itu Vulnerability API ? Vulnerability API adalah aplikasi atau tools yang mempermudah mendapatkan informasi mengenai CVE, CWE, CAPEC dalam berbagai bahasa. Referensi https://cve.circl.lu/ - CIRCL https://www.opencve.io - OPENCVE https://capec.mitre.org/ - MITRE Fitur api - Gunakan API Untuk mendapatkan informasi secara detail.
docs.title: Tentang

docs.text: Vulnerability API adalah aplikasi atau tools yang mempermudah mendapatkan informasi mengenai CVE, CWE, CAPEC dalam berbagai bahasa.
docs.title: Apa itu Vulnerability API ?

docs.text: https://cve.circl.lu/ - CIRCL https://www.opencve.io - OPENCVE https://capec.mitre.org/ - MITRE
docs.title: Referensi

docs.text: api - Gunakan API Untuk mendapatkan informasi secara detail.
docs.title: Fitur

docs.text: Fitur Endpoints /api/vuln/{cve_id} - cve endpoints /api/vuln/{cwe_id} - cwe endpoints /api/vuln/{capec_id} - capec endpoints /api/vuln/generate/{cve_id} - generate file report by cve id Bagaimana Cara Menggunakan tools ini ? CVE python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cve/ {cve_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/vuln/cve/{cve_id}?lang={code_languange}' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cve_id" : "string" , "cwe_id" : "string" , "cvss_score" : "string" , "capec" : [ lis t ], "description" : "string" } } CWE python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cwe_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cwe/ {cwe_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } } CAPEC python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( capec_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/capec/ {capec_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } } Generate File Report python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = f "/api/vuln/generate/ { cve_id } /pdf" url = host + endpoint params = { "cve_id" : cve_id , "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params , allow_redirects = True , stream = True ) if response . status_code == 200 : #write response file filename = ( response . headers . get ( "content-disposition" )) . split ( '"' ) with open ( filename [ 1 ], "wb" ) as file : for chunk in response . iter_content ( chunk_size = 1024 ): file . write ( chunk ) return filename return False curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/generate/{cve_id}/pdf?lang=en&requested_by=guest' \ -H 'accept: application/json' Filerespo nse Bahasa python curl response import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get (): endpoint = f "/api/vuln/languages" url = host + endpoint response = requests . get ( url = url ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/languages' \ -H 'accept: application/json' [ { "country" : "negara" , "code" : "kode" }, ] Interactive API docs Cobalah akses ke halaman swagger, docs . Interactive API documentation dapat mempermudah mu.
docs.title: Fitur

docs.text: /api/vuln/{cve_id} - cve endpoints /api/vuln/{cwe_id} - cwe endpoints /api/vuln/{capec_id} - capec endpoints /api/vuln/generate/{cve_id} - generate file report by cve id
docs.title: Endpoints

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cve/ {cve_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/vuln/cve/{cve_id}?lang={code_languange}' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cve_id" : "string" , "cwe_id" : "string" , "cvss_score" : "string" , "capec" : [ lis t ], "description" : "string" } }
docs.title: CVE

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cwe_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cwe/ {cwe_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } }
docs.title: CWE

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( capec_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/capec/ {capec_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } }
docs.title: CAPEC

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = f "/api/vuln/generate/ { cve_id } /pdf" url = host + endpoint params = { "cve_id" : cve_id , "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params , allow_redirects = True , stream = True ) if response . status_code == 200 : #write response file filename = ( response . headers . get ( "content-disposition" )) . split ( '"' ) with open ( filename [ 1 ], "wb" ) as file : for chunk in response . iter_content ( chunk_size = 1024 ): file . write ( chunk ) return filename return False curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/generate/{cve_id}/pdf?lang=en&requested_by=guest' \ -H 'accept: application/json' Filerespo nse
docs.title: Generate File Report

docs.text: python curl response import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get (): endpoint = f "/api/vuln/languages" url = host + endpoint response = requests . get ( url = url ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/languages' \ -H 'accept: application/json' [ { "country" : "negara" , "code" : "kode" }, ]
